desc: We promote the non-physical aspects of beauty, the essence. Every woman is beautiful, God created us in his image. We are most of the time judged by the physical aspect of beauty which is not eternal as it ages. The essence is linked to our soul which is eternal...

layout.text:
As your skin undergoes its own process of natural
renewal, dead cells and other impurities accumulate
and hide your skin freshest layer, quickly uncloges
pores, removes black heads and complexion dulling
dead cells
